about_the_game:
Enjoy Tickling Mayhem!

The Cyriaan Chronicles is developed by a tickler and written by a tickler.  This RPG adventures focuses on tickling fetish content.  As you follow Lucia through the zany fantasy world of Cyriaan, Lucia and her companions gets into all kinds of ticklish situations, from villains, to fairies, to sometimes each other! 

Voice acted characters!

The Cyriaan Chronicles includes top notch voice acting to bring its characters to life.  Not every line in the game is voice acted, but most of the tickling scenes enjoy laughter from talented, mainstream voice actresses as the story unfolds.

And possibly the most exciting element to the voice acting is Lucia finally has a voice!  The long silent protagonist now has a voice to bring her character to life!

Customize your characters!

The Cyriaan Chronicles features a dazzling amount of options to tailor and optimize your characters.  You can craft several different suits of armor to match your playstyle, and invest the characters' experience into unique and exciting classes to explore.  This is a turn based role playing game where you direct your team of four characters to battle against a variety of enemies.

Explore Cyriaan!

The game world is full of familiar places for fans of the long running comic book series by the same name: The Cyriaan Chronicles.  The world is full of colorful characters ready to give out quests, many even from the comic books!

Unifying storyline!

The comic book series The Cyriaan Chronicles were a series of stand alone stories.  This game is the first time all of the open storylines from the comic books is tied together in one place!  Revisit older, favorite characters, and see how they interact with each other!

Newly Added Quest Journal!

This expansion adds a quest journal to the game for the first time!  This was a long-standing request from players who enjoyed the demo of the game.  The quest journal includes both main story quests and side quests that Lucia and her friends encounter.

A New, Fifth Playable Character Added!

This expansion includes a fifth playable character!  The character can replace any of the original four characters, giving players maximum flexibility in customizing their party.

New Animated enemies!

This expansion introduces several new animated enemies into the game, plus improves on several of the boss graphics by animating them, as well.

content_descriptors.notes: Depictions of non-consensual tickling among characters.  Depiction of consensual roleplay and sexual activities among characters.

name: The Cyriaan Chronicles

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 1GB or better
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

dejus.descriptors:
Conteúdo sexual
Linguagem imprópria
Atos criminosos

short_description: A turn-based RPG in a fantasy setting heavily inspired by 1990s style of RPGs, with a tongue-in-cheek storyline that frequently incorporates tickling.
